## ChatAnalyticsService.report() method

Reports an analytics event. Will perform a promise rejection if the API response contains an error.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
report(event: ChatEventPayLoad): Promise<EventAPIResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | [ChatEventPayLoad](./analytics.chateventpayload.md) | The [ChatEventPayLoad](./analytics.chateventpayload.md) to be sent. |

Promise&lt;[EventAPIResponse](./analytics.eventapiresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;
